title: AIIMS Kalyani Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: All India Institute of Medical Science Kalyani (AIIMS Kalyani) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc. can grab this chance and apply for the AIIMS Kalyani Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
